website_summaries.verdict: Set of 4 plastic doorknob protectors simply designed to blend with home décor.
pros: Keep children from opening doors or locking themselves in a room
Also useful for adults with special needs
Knobs fit any standard round doorknob
Designed to blend unobtrusively with your décor
Spins to prevent child from gripping while offering easy gripping access to adults
cons: May not be convenient for adults with long fingernails
Also, several purchasers found their toddlers about 3 years and up could get the covers off

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: We have tried like 8 of these and they don't snap together very well and our toddlers rips the right off and break on through to the rooms we don't want them in unsupervised. Spend more money and buy a better product that actually serves it purpose well.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Massie

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I first ordered, but they are not just child proof, they are adult proof. I have a family member with cerebral palsy, and a family member with arthritis, and neither one cold open them. After that, I order these, and they do the job GREAT. My child can't get out, but my mom and sister can.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Swango

customer_reviews.title: Bigger and fits better
customer_reviews.text: I'm super happy with these door knobs. They are much bigger then the munchkin ones I bought so they are able to fit over all my door knobs.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Less worrying and no more mess
customer_reviews.text: So simple and yet, so effective! My 2 year old is not happy. Its basically a loose plastic cover that doesn't allow your toddler/child to turn the knob. To turn it, you need to put your fingers on the openings(in order to grab the knob) and turn as usual.
customer_reviews.author: NYC2TX

customer_reviews.title: Not useable, good concept.
customer_reviews.text: These would be great if the hole in the back was bigger. I’m not sure any door knob these would fit on. The area the knob connects to the door would have to be about 1/2 an inch in diameter. Concept and price are good but the product is useless unless you have the worlds skinniest door knob connection.
customer_reviews.author: JK Carter

customer_reviews.title: Do they work....HAHA
customer_reviews.text: Now, these little door knob safety covers do a very good job...too good at times. They work good for what they were intended initially I would presume, but you know those times where you are just trying to tell your kids to go one way so you can slip in the other room and have some peace for a few seconds/minutes/years and so instead your kids run full speed in your direction which causes you to panic and you can't get your freaking door knob to turn because the dang door knob safety cover is ACTUALLY DOING WHAT IT'S SUPPOSED TO DO!?!?! Good cover, works.

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: They’ve dettered my 2.5 yr old from opening doors. It’s tough to open some of my older knobs since they really needed to be gripped up but it’s worth not having him open a door and run down the stairs 👍
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended
customer_reviews.text: I finally took down the baby gate leading to a hallway where the bathroom is located. I was over being the keeper of the gate as my 3 y/o needed to go potty frequently throughout the day. So I got these covers to keep the 1 y/o out of the two closets, garage, and laundry room while letting big brother go to potty as his leisure. They were only a tiny bit tricky to install compared the others we purchased from Target. But I like the design better. Good purchase. I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kay V

customer_reviews.title: After the escape of a senior
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these after the escape of a senior. His first time to hit the road. By the time I missed him, he was about a half mile away and had crossed a busy road. Talk about PTSD, I have it now. A bit afraid to even go out back to mow because I have NO idea why he let himself out and he would be unable to give an explanation if asked. With these on the front door, a dead bolt and a locked knob.... I have high hopes that this would prevent another walk out by the senior. I have to work at opening it .... so I think I may have prevented another life changing event.
customer_reviews.author: nyla martens

customer_reviews.title: Bigger and Better than the Wal-Mart Ones
customer_reviews.text: I bought a multi-pack from Wal-Mart and they were a nice thick plastic but useless because they wouldn't snap together completely. These, on the other hand, will fit over those decorative doorknobs you didn't realize you had. You know, those ball shaped brushed silver ones? The plastic is slightly thinner but they are still more than functional and a good price. Will buy again for my parent's house.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great knob covers.
customer_reviews.text: Work just as good as you would expect. My 2 year old can’t figure them out. And they don’t make it any more difficult for me to open the door.
customer_reviews.author: Pelthail

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect. Price was good
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect. Price was good. They are simple to put on and take off. I like the super basic design. And for most of my handles, there is a decent amount of extra space so they could fit a slightly bigger handle if needed My twins are only 11months, so not reaching up at them yet. So can’t tell you how they do when kids grab them, but so far, great purchase. At this time, I would buy more of the same brand if I needed more.
customer_reviews.author: Jes M.

customer_reviews.title: Better than other toddler proof doorknobs
customer_reviews.text: This is our second attempt at finding toddler proof doorknob covers. The first set we purchased off of Amazon didn’t work well because they were so easy to remove that my toddler figured it out. These knob covers have a more secure fit so my toddler can’t just take these off when she wants to get into something. Overall I feel the quality of these is much better than the other set I tried so I would definitely them.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Way too hard to open door with
customer_reviews.text: My almost 3 year old was starting to open our back door leading to the garage on her own. If the garage was open, she was gone. So we had to do something. However, these locks are so hard to use the door handle through, ive been trapped inside my house before trying to rip the thing off just to open the door. I’ve been late for work trying to get out of my own door once my husband left!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They WORK!
customer_reviews.text: These are the easiest and most effective door knobs covers I have seen. Each cover comes as 2 pieces that you just put them around the door knob, put them together until you hear a 'click' and that's it, they are installed. They can be a little tricky even for adults to open, so they do their job when you are childproofing your home. That's the only con I can find, sometimes for me it's hard to open the bathroom door, as you need to put your fingers in the spaces which are not covered, and somehow, twist the door knob, then it will open. Totally recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as pictured and work great!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as pictured, and they work very well. I particularly like how the back part can fit over the larger door knobs.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Drew

customer_reviews.title: Does The Job But Also Keeps Adults Out Too
customer_reviews.text: Hard for Adults to Use. Recommend the ones that have rubber grippers to grab handle so you can actually open the door and little hands cant. If they are old enough and smart enough to figure it out then they are smart and old enough to learn not to open doors they are not supposed too. Just sayin.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old hasn't figured these out yet, there is ONE flaw in the design, but you really wouldn't be able to get them off otherwise. If you pull down on them really hard, like if a 2 year old decides to hang off of the door knob because they are upset that you went to the bathroom without them(the audacity) then the whole thing pops apart. Next thing you know your pants are around your ankles and everyone is saying MOMMMYYYYY
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Fit!
customer_reviews.text: This product didn't fit my knob. After trying to get it on the door knob, I noticed it was kind of tight. When I tried to turn the knob to see if the product worked, it didn't. The shell was so tight, we couldn't turn the door knob at all. When I realized it was too small, I tried to get it off the know. I broke the knob shell trying to get it off my door knob. That's how tight it was. So...a waist of money for me.
customer_reviews.author: Fia

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly: loose so they spin around when little hands try to turn the knob.
customer_reviews.text: These work great and for perfectly. I purchased a set from a local store, name brand for child safety. Those were way too tight on my doorknobs and did nothing to prevent my toddler from opening the door. Got another set at a different store, same result. My doorknobs are standard sized so I don't know why these others were so small. Bought this set on here and they work perfectly. Loose enough so my toddler can't figure them out. Yea!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Francisco

customer_reviews.title: These will fit on large knobs!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a set because my 2 yo has figured out how to open doors. I originally purchased a set from Walmart; but they did not fit any of my doorknobs due to a "lip" that they had. I noticed that these did not have that "lip" and ordered them immediately. These fit my doorknobs with out any problems. Highly recommend these to parents looking for a doorknob safety cover.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I got these to cat-proof my basement door!
customer_reviews.text: I have two exceptionally intelligent cats who figured out how to open a door with a DOOR KNOB! I had heard about these door knob covers to child-proof doors and I thought I would give them a try. They work great! The cats are safe and I have peace of mind that my fur babies aren't getting into the basement. A very inexpensive way to keep my babies out of trouble!
customer_reviews.author: 3Ms

customer_reviews.title: Working well for my 2 yr old toddler but feel slightly cheap
customer_reviews.text: I needed to keep my toddler out of the coat closet and this product is working well to keep him from turning the handle. They do feel a little cheap but I haven't had any break so overall the quality is fine. Easy for adults and my older kids to use while on the door knob too.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle NTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on, but hangs loose on the knob. This makes it difficult to get a grip on the knob through the holes and then turn it at the same time. Good for the price, but I’d probably look for something else next time.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke E.

customer_reviews.title: They work to keep the 2 yo in the house and out of certain rooms. but
customer_reviews.text: They work to keep the 2 yo in the house and out of certain rooms. but if there's a push button lock on the door, it often get bumped by anyone and can lock an adult out and has. A space in the front keeps that from happening.
customer_reviews.author: bbenn

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: For some reason, the brands of doorknob covers I could buy at the store (Target, Wal-Mart, etc.) Didn't fit my doorknobs anymore. They changed their sizing or something and shrunk. I ordered these unsure if they'd work, but the pictures looked like they might. I'm happy to say that they do fit with room to spare! Thanks so much!
customer_reviews.author: MotherOf3

customer_reviews.title: 4 1/2 stars
customer_reviews.text: These are really easy to use and they keep our kid from opening doors. One of them didn't line up exactly right so there is a little gap. It is still functional but doesnt look quite right, which is the only thing keeping it from getting 5 stars. I'd I could I would give them 4 1/2
customer_reviews.author: Simeon Redberg

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Product works!
customer_reviews.text: I have confidence in this product knowing that even I have to hold the knob a certain way to get it to turn. We have not had issues with our toddler opening the door with these. The frame sticks together fine and has been durable.
customer_reviews.author: chris carrillo

customer_reviews.title: Not cat proof
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to keep my one cat out of my bedroom. Somehow the little rascal figured out a way to still open my door. Seemed like a good idea to keep her out, but it didn’t work for me. They may be child proof, but they are definitely not cat proof.
customer_reviews.author: Squeakss

customer_reviews.title: Adequate door knob protectors
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a baby shower (the mom-to-be has a toddler and had registered for them), but Target was out of them so Amazon was the next best thing - and voilá - arrived quickly and was a great buy for keeping the toddler out of baby's room, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Linda B.

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy but It Works Fine
customer_reviews.text: This door knob safety cover comes in two halves that you need to snap together over the door knob. It's a little flimsy, but it works fine so far. My child is almost 2 and he hasn't been able open the door since I installed this cover.
customer_reviews.author: Hancyclopedia

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and generally effective
customer_reviews.text: They clip on well and generally work well, making it difficult for a toddler to open the door while not terribly inconvenient for adults to open them. They're not that easy to remove, but somehow my toddler when throwing a tantrum is able to brute force them off by pulling very hard, so thats something to watch out for.
customer_reviews.author: A. Webster

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional service, my item arrived a few days ahead of schedule. Packaged extremely well with air wrap so the product didn’t get damaged. I’ve got hexagon shaped door knobs and I was worried the traditional round locks wouldn’t work on my doors but they fit very well and my toddler can no longer open the door.
customer_reviews.author: Taisha Danger Savage

customer_reviews.title: Alright product but not right for persistent children
customer_reviews.text: Goes on easy but also comes off easy for my almost two year old. He just pulls on it and it pops right off. More for someone like a grandparent or somewhere the child isn’t at everyday so it doesn’t need to be used all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Polka dots n daisies

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: One comes pre assembled. To take it apart, I broke it. So I lost one of the four to begin with. I know it's to show what it looks like. But the brackets that locks it together are small and plastic. So it was easy to break when taken apart. Since it's fragile, it will be difficult to move them to different knobs. But once installed, it works as intended.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my son in
customer_reviews.text: These new my almost 2 year old in great. On my back door I can open them fine with them on, but my front door handle is slightly smaller than my back door and it makes it really hard to open sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Nessapier

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: My almost 2 year old figured out how to open the doors now that she's tall enough so of course these had to be ordered. She was very unhappy when they first went on the doors and they work perfectly. Super easy to put on or take off if need be.
customer_reviews.author: Annamaria

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: These are ok. I have small door handles and it is really hard to get a grip on the knob with these. I imagine if you had larger, more modern handles these would work fine. Just not great for me.
customer_reviews.author: cat123

customer_reviews.title: This is a great buy!
customer_reviews.text: These are so easy to use for adult installation, and it really really really saved us with the constant opening of the doors for toddlers! So happy we bought these.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley S.

customer_reviews.title: Works good,  keeps my son from opening!
customer_reviews.text: It works great as mu soon is catching on to doors and opening them. Now he can't. The only thing that I'd a little tricky is learning how to get a good grip on the door. Iiieez a little narrow so you have to get the right angle.
customer_reviews.author: Cortney

customer_reviews.title: They get the job done!
customer_reviews.text: So far these have kept our now 2 year old from opening any doors for the last 6 months! They really work. So far, none have been broken or damaged either, so thats a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Greg from Cleveland

customer_reviews.title: happy with product
customer_reviews.text: These were easy to put together and keep my toddler from opening the front door by himself. They are a tiny bit tricky for adult use, but once you get use to them it is just second nature.
customer_reviews.author: Acoustic_Shadow

customer_reviews.title: These are life savers for elder care
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these because my mother is dealing with dementia. These door knob covers prevent her from slipping out of the house undetected or going into other rooms of the house and getting lost.
customer_reviews.author: ddbug60

customer_reviews.title: Work well
customer_reviews.text: These are hard to get apart to take on and off but they work great once they are on the door. Actually would have been cheaper to buy at Walmart but easier to order and have shipped right to my house so worth the extra money
customer_reviews.author: Brittany H

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: Dont second guess it... just buy them. My 2 year old is one smart little man and can figure anything out over a little bit of time but these have left him challenged. Love them and would buy more. We purchased the 4 pack. This is also a great gofe idea for a 1 year olds birthday party lol.
customer_reviews.author: PointBlank

customer_reviews.title: Finally covers that fit our doorknobs!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several other brands for our standard round doorknobs but the "neck" always needed a little more room and they never fit to snap closed. These fit perfect with even a little extra room. So easy to snap on and off if needed too. If you are like me having trouble finding some with a wider opening from the back, these are it!
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: They work great!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased Safety First ones that didn’t fit our knobs. So I was leary of ordering another type that wouldn’t fit, but these fit! So happy we can now block the toddler from getting into certain rooms.
customer_reviews.author: BarbieFan

customer_reviews.title: Goes on easy, but also comes off easy.
customer_reviews.text: We needed something to prevent my toddler from opening all kinds of doors in my home. This appeared to be the perfect solution....Unfortunately, these are so cheaply made that my 2 year old is able to remove them from the handle at will.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Not for small, skinny knobs
customer_reviews.text: They are very easy to install on the door knobs and seem to be durable. But they are hard to use even as an adult to open the doors, well for my knobs which are smaller, skinny and hard to grip through the safety cover. If you have the fatter door knobs would work better to be able to grip better. Only reason I gave 3 🌟 🌟 🌟
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Smith

customer_reviews.title: Does what it’s supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: These fit our standard door knobs perfectly. If you’re not careful while opening, they’ll pinch your fingers but it’s fine. Definitely not a deal breaker. Now we don’t have to worry about our 2 year old raiding the pantry
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Not secure
customer_reviews.text: Love the price and how easy is it to install, but I’m unfortunately that was also the problem. My 4 year old ripped off the door knob extremely easy and ran out the door again.
customer_reviews.author: Berenice

customer_reviews.title: Does its job
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little bigger than our door knob but it does what it suppose to do. My 18 mo likes to roll the door knob now but with this he can’t open any door any more. 5 star
customer_reviews.author: Yao

customer_reviews.title: Pick a different brand
customer_reviews.text: These pop off easily compared to a different brand I've purchased in the past. Had to tape around them to keep them on the knobs because the smaller plastic pieces that hold them together snap off easily.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen P. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Must be sure it fits your knobs
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly it did not fit any of my door knob handles I do not know why and I am returning the product Great idea great product if it would fit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice quick fix for keeping doors locked
customer_reviews.text: I found that they were tight on some of my door knobs probably more useful for smaller knobs. But they do work as a deterrent from children being able to open doors
customer_reviews.author: Arley

customer_reviews.title: They fit our door knobs!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful and they fit all of our doors except one that is a much wider door knob. I have them on every door I can possible with the exception of that one, and I’m very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Mom Life

customer_reviews.title: Straight to trash
customer_reviews.text: One broke as I was assembling; a small tab snapped off. I put two covers on two doorknobs, and they did not keep my 2-year old daughter from opening the door. She just pulled the cover apart with hardly any effort. Very disappointed in this product. Straight to the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect but do the job
customer_reviews.text: They do their job but aren't super easy for adults to use. We've had one incident where our toddler pulled it off his closet door and went climbing. It only happened once (over a month ago) so hoping it was user error and I just hadn't clicked it in properly.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: A little hard to get use to. But work great once you do. We needed them for my parents with Alzheimer’s who try to wander. Work great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The door stays closed
customer_reviews.text: These are nothing fancy, but they do their job. We had a solid couple weeks of our three year old coming into our room at 6 am and needed to fix that. The first couple days, he still got out of bed and rattled the door and called out. After that, I think he finally got that it wasn’t going to happen and didn’t try to leave. Now he’s actually sleeping until a reasonable time, which has made for a much less grumpy toddler (and mom).
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: A must-have with little ones
customer_reviews.text: So I bought these for our little one that's getting his hands into everything. Like our medicine cabinets and bathroom items. These work perfectly. He's such a smart boy and he couldn't get in and he couldn't figure out how to turn the knob with these on.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Mrs Lipira

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and works well in detracting toddlers from opening door but feels a bit flimsy. Plastic is pretty cheap but it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Bassgal

customer_reviews.title: Great if your kid is not super strong
customer_reviews.text: They are great products, but my two year old pulls on it and it easily disassembles.but before he figured it out it was great to keep him out of trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Hilda koprowski

customer_reviews.title: Use for mother with dementia on closet door
customer_reviews.text: Deterant for mom who has dementia with hopes of avoiding all night closet rearranging. Some days she can get her closet door open some days she can’t but it helps
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: The 2yo hasn't been able to open the doors we don't want her to, and the 4yo hasn't been able to take them apart like he did a previous brand. I'm satisfied! They snapped on quickly, easily, and securely.
customer_reviews.author: S. P. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: My 3 year old can’t take these apart no problem ...
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old can’t take these apart no problem. So I have to tape them so she can’t.
customer_reviews.author: Lunchbox005

customer_reviews.title: Must have with toddlers
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these and they didn't fit my door knobs but the customer service was AAMAZING and I would highly recommend buying these. They were nice quality, great price, and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Nicki

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the toddlers in!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for keeping my toddler from opening the door to the stairs or bathroom without an adult. Even grandma who is here visiting often can operate them!
customer_reviews.author: Kellie M

customer_reviews.title: Great Service, Great Product
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to "kid proof" doorknobs. The product works great, easy to install and easy to use. We received quick and speedy and accurate service!
customer_reviews.author: Semmie

customer_reviews.title: Better than safety 1st
customer_reviews.text: These are way better than the safety first ones as they actually fit my door knobs, with some room to spare. My 2 yr old has yet to foil them and they aren't adult proof so I give them 5 stars all the way!
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Not effective - Too easy to open door
customer_reviews.text: This is very cheapy made, with very little effort your young one will figure out how to pop these off the door. Ours lasted less than one hour. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps kids out
customer_reviews.text: Woks great but comes off easily when pulled by children. Reinforced with some tape and its unstoppable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. We live in a manufactured home and measurements are different than standard homes but it fits well. My toddler was starting to play with the knob and since we live on water we needed some extra security. He just spins the cover for entertainment and it has held up. This is worth the peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: LovingLife

customer_reviews.title: They work fine
customer_reviews.text: I have smaller door knobs and they did not work quite as well as I would have liked. I wish the fit a bit snugger.
customer_reviews.author: Cindi H

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Door knob covers fit perfectly. I love the fact that you can still grip the door knob and open the door easily. I have tried other brands that made opening the door difficult for adults.
customer_reviews.author: betty

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: It installed easily on the knobs. They are little loose on the knobs but that is not a problem at all. My 3.5 yr old has finally figured out how to open with these covers so not much safety but it slows him down.
customer_reviews.author: Pranshu

customer_reviews.title: They break open right away
customer_reviews.text: These are so easy to crack open, it's ridiculous. We ducked taped them shut, and then yes, they work. But not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: BGill

customer_reviews.title: Work great and cheap!
customer_reviews.text: These have been working great! They snapped on and work perfectly and the low cost is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: B. Browning

customer_reviews.title: Door knob saftey covers
customer_reviews.text: The price is great and they sure work. My grandson can open all my doors but with these on no more opening doors. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This stopped our toddler from opening the doors right away! When we first got it, he was able to take it apart but since then, he hasn’t done that. Would definitely purchase if you need your kid not to open certain doors.
customer_reviews.author: WANDSB

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: They work as expected. They're dead simple to install and fairly hard to remove, which is a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: Y M

customer_reviews.title: Knobs worth the money
customer_reviews.text: These door knobs do their job. Easy to use, easy to take apart and put back together.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Cross

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Useless!!. Doesn’t fit most standard doorknobs. And the ONE knob in my house that it did fit on... my 36 month old opened the door as if it wasn’t even there!!! Absolutely ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: nycferretgrl

customer_reviews.title: Easily removed by my 2 year old.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, easy to install, also easy for my 2 year old to crush off the doorknob. This serves as more of a distraction to stall my 2 year old than it does to prevent her from causing mischief.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Yes and no
customer_reviews.text: Gave this a 3 because although it worked for my 2 1/2 year old, it did not work for my 4 year old. She QUICKLY found out how to open the door WITH the safety knob still on. THEN she found out how to take the safety knob off.
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: Not ideal for younger potty trained kids, but great product
customer_reviews.text: Has kept our 2 year old out of bathroom and our bedroom. They were easy to put on our normal knobs and are easy for us to use. However, we had family over and it was difficult for the 3 year old that is potty trained to open due to the gap and her small hands.
customer_reviews.author: laura clayton

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work @ my house
customer_reviews.text: The baby has figured out how to still open the door, even with this "deterrent" on the door Knob
customer_reviews.author: lilgrl

customer_reviews.title: Nah
customer_reviews.text: Soo easy to forcefully take down by a toddler (16mo) but so hard to open the door with it on it. Especially if they are locked
customer_reviews.author: Tijana

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: We have a very smart almost 2 year old who has figured out locks and other knob safety covers, we were losing our minds trying to keep him out of places he shouldn’t be. Already these do exactly what they are supposed to and prevent him from opening doors! He tries and they just spin, they seem to snap together tighter and wouldn’t be as easy for him to get off. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good safety feature
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to install and easy to use. Taking them off is harder, but still do-able. They fit most of our door knobs - we have two older that were too big for the covers, but shaving the plastic down a little with the Dremel was easy and fixed the issue. I would recommend these to others.
customer_reviews.author: J C Nicodin

customer_reviews.title: Stubborn child? DONT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This is a poorly made "safety device" our daughter at a year and a half ripped it right off the door. If your child is stubborn as EVERY child this age is, do not buy this. It won't work. I didnt trust it so kept an eye on her and she ripped it in half and opened the door.
customer_reviews.author: NateO

customer_reviews.title: These work just as intended!
customer_reviews.text: My family is really happy with these door knob covers. My almost 2 year old can't open any door with them on, but we adults can with ease. They were also a sinch to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley A

customer_reviews.title: Baby niece pulled one off the door.
customer_reviews.text: My strong two year old niece pulled this off the door and got into our cleaning/chemical cabinet. We caught her before she got into anything - thank God.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Keeping grandkids from opening the doors  Chlid proof door knobs
customer_reviews.text: The grandkids cannot open the door with this child proof knobs on, Some of the adults can't open the door either. Thanks for the great products.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Redd

customer_reviews.title: Keeping my girls safe!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Keeps my 2 year old safe from the stairs and going outside. They are cheap looking but great price.
customer_reviews.author: chris hutchinson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes even I cant get out! Overall its easy to install
customer_reviews.author: HG

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install all. My toddler had just learned to open the front door and this was just what we needed. Sometimes it's a little hard for me to use when my hands are wet or I'm carrying lots of stuff but totally worth it for the piece of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Meghann F.

customer_reviews.title: Work well for awhile!
customer_reviews.text: Worked until there kids figured out how to pop then off!
customer_reviews.author: winsaloteasy

customer_reviews.title: Easy for toddler to get off
customer_reviews.text: Notice the pieces on the floor and the open door. About 10 seconds after I put it on, my not even 2 year old was able to easily get it off. These are very cheaply made and do not snap together very well. I will be returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Wenning

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: Son still hasnt figured them out and it's been a few months lol Love the itam and great price!!
customer_reviews.author: Katie L.

product_meta.title: Door Knob Safety Cover (4 Pack) Child Proof Doors - Child Safety Covers - Little Giggles
feature_bullets: Prevent your child from opening doors or locking themselves in a room with a door knob cover.
Our Door Knob Safety Cover features a design that will blend in to your home decor.
Suitable for most standard round doorknobs.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars650 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
